name: Haunted Catviction
description:
Control a spooky ghost cat to evict the ghost hunters from the house by solving environmental puzzles to scare them away while evading the ghost hunters who are trying to exorcise ghost cat.

Keyboard: 

  • Movement - WASD
  • Use/Pickup - Space Bar
  • Sprint - Shift

Controller:

  • Movement - Left Analog Stick
  • Use/Pickup - Bottom button (A)
  • Sprint - Left Trigger
